alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 12:20AM CDT until June 19 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTY... At 1220 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Skyline, or 9 miles northwest of Scottsboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. This storm has a history of producing at least quarter sized hail. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Hollywood, Skyline, Pleasant Groves, Martintown, Fackler, Trenton and Larkinsville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
